name: I hate this game
description: I hate this game is a logic game, where gameplay changes every level. Solve crazy puzzles and use forgotten functions of your PC! Be attentive, interact with everything that you see on the screen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later Processor: 1.60 GHz+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 277 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.0 GHz i5 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB of RAM, at least 1280x720 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Savvy and sense of humor
